Need 15 RP to get Surgeon Shen :(
try sending Rito one of your amazing drawing ;)
I have a quick question, have you temporarily disabled key shards? I have not got received one in 30+ games and thats not an exaggeration.
im asking the same thing. i actually cant remember the last time i got a key shard

I have recently looked this up and an employee has stated that the more key shards that you get - the lower chance you have of getting them. So the more key shards you have or have used has impacted on the decreased amount that you have been getting. He also stated that this resets after every month though.
Yeah I finally figured that out too, thanks for the reassurance tho! :)
I didn't see this posted by anyone anywhere but going off mine and my friends statistics we have received more keys from ARAM than norms, by quite a bit.
ye ikr!
Why no project yi?
Cuz he's Legendary; they aren't in sale rotations anymore.  They get one Early Sale and that's it... You likely missed his.
